description: This file initializes and renders the main React application, setting up routing and rendering the root component into the DOM.

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a React root for rendering the app into the DOM.

methods.name: React.StrictMode
methods.description: A wrapper component to enable additional checks and warnings for its descendants.

methods.name: BrowserRouter
methods.description: Enables client-side routing for the React application.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders React elements into the root DOM node.
